      • setCharset

        public void setCharset(java.lang.String charset)
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        Set the name of the character set used for the row delimiter. This is also used by subclasses to interpret field delimiters, comment strings, and for configuring FieldParsers. These fields are interpreted when set. Changing the charset thereafter may cause unexpected results.
        覆盖:
        setCharset 在类中 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
        参数:
        charset - name of the charset

      • open

        public void open(FileInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        Opens the given input split. This method opens the input stream to the specified file, allocates read buffers and positions the stream at the correct position, making sure that any partial record at the beginning is skipped.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
        参数:
        split - The input split to open.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.
        另请参阅:
        FileInputFormat.open(org.apache.flink.core.fs.FileInputSplit)

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        Closes the input by releasing all buffers and closing the file input stream.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the closing of the file stream causes an I/O error.
